abstractText: These six Nepalese palm-leaf folios, probably dated to the 13th or 14th century, preserve some of the Homapañjikā section of Kuladatta's Kriyāsaṃgrahapañjikā, a work on Buddhist tantric rituals from ca. the 12th century.
abstractShort: These six Nepalese palm-leaf folios, probably dated to the 13th or 14th century, preserve some of the Homapañjikā section
title: Kriyāsaṃgrahapañjikā
